word_mean: 最后的，最终的：胚胎学上表示最终分化或特性的获得
在寄生虫学上表示寄生物在其体内达到有性阶段的宿主

sentence.Network_en: His "An Orkney Tapestry" is still the definitive book on the islands.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的《奥克尼挂毯》一书仍是关于这些岛屿的最权威著作。

sentence.Network_en: There is no definitive test as yet for the condition.
sentence.Network_cn: 对这种病目前还没有决定性的检测手段。

sentence.Network_en: This book is the definitive guide to world cuisine.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本书是世界美食的权威指南.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French definitif, -ive, from Latin definitivus, from definit- 'set within limits', from the verb definire (see define)

entry.tran: 明确的;最终的;不可更改的;决定性的
entry.def: Something that is definitive provides a firm conclusion that cannot be questioned.

example.ex: No one has come up with a definitive answer as to why this should be so...
example.tran: 对于为什么应该是这样，还没有人想出最终确定的答案。

example.ex: There is no definitive test as yet for the condition.
example.tran: 对这种病目前还没有决定性的检测手段。

entry.tran: （书籍或表演）最佳的，最具权威的
entry.def: A definitive book or performance is thought to be the best of its kind that has ever been done or that will ever be done.

example.ex: His 'An Orkney Tapestry' is still the definitive book on the islands.
example.tran: 他的《奥克尼挂毯》一书仍是关于这些岛屿的最权威著作。

sentences.sentence: "the plain and unequivocal language of the laws"- R.B.Taney

means.word_mean: 3. supplying or being a final or conclusive settlement;

stems_affixes.type_exp: =limit,boundary,end 表示"结束,范围,界限,限制"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 被限制的, 狭窄的, 分娩的
stems_affixes.word_buile: confine[v.限制;使不外出,禁闭n.[n.]界限,范围]+ed……的→adj.被限制的, 狭窄的, 分娩的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 确切的,权威性的;最后的,决定性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: define[v.给……下定义;阐述;阐释;限定,规定]+itive……的→规定了的,决定了的
fine范围,限制→[罚款]以约束,限制

means.word_mean: 最后的；决定性的；不可更改的

sentences.en: Her book is the definitive works on Milton.
sentences.cn: 她的书是论述密尔顿的定论性著作。
我们取得了决定性的胜利。

jushi.chinese: 这本书是论述鲁迅的定论性著作。
